Content:: The Pasteur Institute is an institute located in Algiers, Algeria. Its library holds 47,000 volumes.[1] The Institute has the following missions: carrying out analyzes and diagnoses, it also ensures epidemiological surveillance, research, training, production and import and distribution of the main vaccines to health establishments and animal husbandry. laboratory animals that are the subject of experiments.[2] This Algeria-related article is a stub.
